text: Kim Dong-jin (born 29 January 1982) is a South Korean football coach and a former professional footballer who played as a full-back or a wing-back. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League League National cup National cup League cup League cup Continental Continental Total Total Club Season Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals FC Seoul 2000 K League 4 0 2 0 3 1 2 0 11 1 FC Seoul 2001 K League 5 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 6 0 FC Seoul 2002 K League 3 0 0 0 5 0 4 0 12 0 FC Seoul 2003 K League 35 5 1 0 — — 36 5 FC Seoul 2004 K League 18 3 2 0 0 0 — 20 3 FC Seoul 2005 K League 21 3 2 0 11 0 — 34 3 FC Seoul 2006 K League 13 1 1 0 0 0 — 14 1 FC Seoul Total Total 99 12 8 0 20 1 6 0 133 13 Zenit Saint Petersburg 2006 Russian Premier League 17 0 0 0 — — 17 0 Zenit Saint Petersburg 2007 Russian Premier League 24 2 4 0 — 8 2 36 4 Zenit Saint Petersburg 2008 Russian Premier League 10 0 0 0 — 4 0 14 0 Zenit Saint Petersburg 2009 Russian Premier League 17 1 1 0 — 3 0 21 1 Zenit Saint Petersburg Total Total 68 3 5 0 — 15 2 88 5 Ulsan Hyundai 2010 K League 22 0 1 0 1 0 — — 24 0 FC Seoul 2011 K League 9 1 1 0 0 0 4 0 14 1 Hangzhou Greentown 2012 Chinese Super League 27 1 2 0 — — — — 29 1 Hangzhou Greentown 2013 Chinese Super League 28 1 0 0 — — — — 28 1 Hangzhou Greentown Total Total 55 2 2 0 — — 57 2 Muangthong United 2014 Thai Premier League 31 2 ? ? ? ? 0 0 31 2 Muangthong United 2015 Thai Premier League 27 0 ? ? ? ? — — 27 0 Muangthong United Total Total 58 2 ? ? ? ? 0 0 58 2 Seoul E-Land 2016 K League 2 34 1 ? ? — — — — 34 1 Kitchee 2016–17 Hong Kong Premier League 4 0 ? ? — — 0 0 4 0 Kitchee 2017–18 Hong Kong Premier League 7 1 ? ? — — 0 0 7 1 Kitchee Total Total 11 1 ? ? — — 0 0 11 1 Hoi King (loan) 2018–19 Hong Kong Premier League 5 0 ? ? — — — — 5 0 Career total Career total Career total 361 22 17 0 21 1 25 2 424 25 ===International=== :Results list South Korea's goal tally first.
